text: "Tusk" is a 1979 song by British American band Fleetwood Mac. It is the title track from their 12th studio album Tusk. It went to number 3 in Australia, number 4 in New Zealand, number 5 in Canada, number 6 in Austria and the United Kingdom, number 7 in Germany, number 8 in the United States, number 9 in the Netherlands and number 15 in Ireland. ==References== Category:1979 songs Category:Fleetwood Mac songs Category:Blues rock songs
title: Tusk (song)
